summary.span: 提供一种自定义重写 ASP.NET 代码访问安全策略的 ASP.NET 运行时行为的方法。

span.span: Provides a way to customize ASP.NET behavior at run time that overrides the ASP.NET code access security policy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在复杂的 Web 宿主环境（如 SharePoint 和 Web 场）中，你可能需要扩展 ASP.NET 代码访问安全策略。In complex Web hosting environments such as SharePoint and Web farms, you might have to extend the ASP.NET code access security policy. 通过扩展 类型，可以实现重写 ASP.NET 代码访问安全策略的自定义安全策略行为。By extending the type, you can implement custom security policy behavior that overrides the ASP.NET code access security policy. ## 配置 HostSecurityPolicyResolver 类Configuring a HostSecurityPolicyResolver Class 在配置文件中，可以通过将 特性添加到元素来配置自定义 实例。In the configuration files, you can configure a custom instance by adding the attribute to the element. 特性可以设置为将由 ASP.NET 加载的自定义 类型的名称。The attribute can be set to the name of the custom type that will be loaded by ASP.NET. 属性值包含派生类型的完全限定名称。The attribute value contains the fully qualified name of the derived type. 默认情况下，[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 不设置此属性。By default, [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] does not set this attribute. 下面的语法演示如何配置属性：The following syntax shows how to configure the attribute: ``` ``` 可以将 `trust` 元素中的 属性设置为一个字符串值，该值指示应使用部分信任配置文件中的命名权限集。The attribute in the `trust` element can be set to a string value that indicates which named permission set in a partial trust configuration file should be used. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 4 将该属性设置为 "ASP.Net"。By default, ASP.NET 4 sets this attribute to "ASP.Net". `trust` 元素中的 属性指示 ASP.NET 将加载的自定义 对象。The attribute in the `trust` element indicates the custom object that will be loaded by ASP.NET. 如果将属性设置为空字符串，应用程序将使用 ASP.NET 默认逻辑来确定程序集的权限。If the attribute is set to an empty string, the application uses the ASP.NET default logic for determining the permissions for the assembly. 类型属性不能设置为 null 值。The type attribute cannot be set to a null value. > [!IMPORTANT] > 包含派生 类型的程序集必须以完全信任的方式运行，因为自定义类型提供 ASP.NET 可用于将程序集提升到完全信任的信息。The assembly that contains a derived type must run with full trust, because the custom type provides information that ASP.NET can use to elevate assemblies to full trust. 通常情况下，应在全局程序集缓存中部署自定义策略解析程序类型，它将以完全信任的方式运行。In general, you should deploy a custom policy resolver type in the global assembly cache, where it will run with full trust. 实现此类时，必须重写 方法。When you implement this class, you must override the method. 根据作为参数传递的 实例，方法会返回一个枚举值，指示要应用于程序集的安全策略。Depending on the instance that is passed as a parameter, the method returns an enumeration value that indicates the security policy to apply to the assembly. 可用的安全策略集由 枚举决定。The set of available security policies is determined by the enumeration.
